person.persName: Nathaniel Gaither (Adair County, Kentucky, attorney and secretary of state)

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, attorney and secretary of state. Adair County native. Son of Nathaniel Gaither and Martha Morrison Gaither. Married to Susan Shelby Magoffin. Household owned eighteen enslaved persons in 1850. Admitted to the bar in Adair County. Served as a school commissioner and county attorney. Member of the Legislature of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1859 to 1861. Secretary of State of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from October 2, 1861 to August 18, 1862. Served with the 6th Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.).
